problematic: Most offensive Dutch curse, cancer-related. Extremely taboo and socially unacceptable. Often used by teens despite social stigma.
Combination of kanker + lijer (sufferer). One of the most offensive possible Dutch insults.
Typhoid-based curse. Less taboo than kanker as typhoid is historical. Used as adjective for unpleasant things.
Tuberculosis-based curse. Commonly used disease-based swear, less severe than kanker.
Tuberculosis variant. Milder of the disease-based curses.
Cholera-based curse. Disconnected from disease origins in modern usage.
Female genitalia reference. Extremely versatile - used as expletive, adjective, adverb. Can describe feelings or weather.
Combination of kut + wijf (derogatory woman). Female equivalent of klootzak.
Male genitalia reference. Used to describe unsympathetic man or as general insult meaning asshole/prick.
Literally 'scrotum/ball sack'. Used for irritating, annoying or disagreeable person.
From kloten (testicles). Used as expletive, adjective, or adverb like 'kut'.
Creative compound: kloot (ball) + viool (violin). Humorous insult.
Prostitute. Often combined with other terms.
Compound: stoep (sidewalk) + hoer. Streetwalker reference.
Verb meaning 'to fuck'. Used in compounds and expressions.
Literally 'ant fucker'. Someone who obsesses over minor details, nitpicker. Can be verb (mierenneuken).
Direct translation of 'goddammit'. Standalone expression of frustration or anger.
Shortened version of godverdomme for milder impact. Equivalent to 'damn'.
Euphemism for godverdomme. Socially acceptable, used around children and in professional settings.
Used like in English - shock, frustration, disbelief. Mild blasphemy.
Literally 'acorn'. Similar to klootzak but milder. Describes foolish rather than malicious behavior.
Mild slang for female private parts. Used as insult for women.
Slut, promiscuous woman. Derogatory term for women.
Penis, dick. Anatomical slang.
Diminutive of lul. Milder due to diminutive form (-je ending).
Literally 'pancake'. Used as mild insult meaning fool or idiot.
Compound: suf (drowsy/dull) + kop (head). Meaning dullard or dimwit.
Idiot. Standard mild insult about intelligence.
Dimwit, someone pitiable rather than contemptible. Relatively mild.
From stom (stupid). Meaning fool or dummy.
From dom (stupid). Very mild insult meaning dummy.
Compound: kut + zooi (mess). Meaning fucking mess or shitty situation.
Compound: klote + zooi. Similar to kutzooi but slightly milder.
English loanword. Common among Dutch speakers due to English proficiency.
English loanword. Commonly used by younger Dutch speakers.
English loanword. Popular among younger generations.
Flemish (Belgian) creative way of cursing God. Regional to Belgium.
Flemish: baby cow, meaning childish hapless idiot. Regional to Belgium.
Flemish: despicable idiot or dimwit. Regional to Belgium.
Devil. Often in phrase 'loop naar de duivel' (go to the devil). More common in Belgium.
Mild euphemism, similar to 'darn it'. Very socially acceptable.
Shit, feces. Scatological term.
Childish term for poop. Very mild, often used with children.
Childish term for crap/poop. Very mild.
Turd. Mild scatological term, often diminutive.
Compound: rot (rotten) + zooi (mess). Meaning mess or rubbish situation.
Compound: rot (rotten) + kop (head). Meaning jerk or asshole.
To piss/urinate. Also used as verb meaning to whine or complain.
Compound: zeik (piss) + nerd. Someone who constantly complains.
Mild term for pee/urine. Child-friendly.
Fart. Mild bodily function term.
Stupid (adjective). Very mild when used as 'stomme idioot' etc.
Retarded. Ableist slur that's socially problematic.
Extremely offensive ableist slur. Historically used for Down syndrome, now recognized as highly inappropriate.
Imbecile. Ableist term for someone with intellectual disability, used as general insult.
Crazy/mad. Mild term that can be affectionate or mildly insulting depending on context.
Bag/sack. Used as mild insult meaning jerk, especially in compounds.
Derogatory term for woman. Archaic but still used in compounds like kutwijf.
Female dog, bitch. Derogatory term for women.
Witch. Mild derogatory term for difficult woman.
Carrion, corpse of animal. Used as harsh insult for women meaning bitch or nasty person.
Slang term meaning idiot or fool. Relatively mild.
